section3.title: About Tokenomics

card1.title: Unique token issuance mechanism
card1.des: The issuance method of VREF is a combination of ICO and IDO models, which helps to make use of the advantages but limit the disadvantages at the same time.

card2.title: Mechanism that avoids "whales" pump-dump
card2.des: This mechanism can somewhat stop huge investors from market manipulation, a.k.a. pumping prices up and then dumping quickly, harming retail investors and the value of the project

card3.title: Guarantee benefits for investors
card3.des: The retail investors are paid more attention by us to ensure their returns compared to other Blockchain projects on the market.

card4.title: Automatic and transparent
card4.des: Smart contract holds and distributes tokens, all of which are public and transparent on the Blockchain network.

section3.description: ViRef issues its own tokens on the Blockchain system, named VREF. When using the application to receive cash back or receive referral commission, users of ViRef can choose to get cash or get VREF tokens.
